title: Chaos Theory in Double Pendulums
fullDescription:
This project uses Runge-Kutta methods to solve equations of motion. We are currently analyzing the sensitivity to initial conditions.

Next phase: Building a physical prototype.

title: Prime Number Distribution
summary: An analysis of gaps between primes.
fullDescription: We analyzed the Riemann Zeta function and its implications on prime gaps. Results were presented at the Annual Science Fair.
